branchCategory.name: 5000 Series
branchCategory.description: <p>The VQC series has five standard wiring packages bringing a &nbsp;world of ease to wiring and maintenance work, while the &nbsp;protective enclosures of three of them conform to IP67 standards for protection from dust and moisture. &nbsp;The use of multi-pin &nbsp;connectors to replace wiring inside manifold blocks provides &nbsp;flexibility when adding stations or changing manifold configuration. &nbsp; The VQC series has outstanding response times and long life.</p>

branchItem.name: VQC5000 Manifold/Valve Assembly with EX600
branchItem.description: <P>The VQC series has six standard wiring packages bringing a world of ease to wiring and maintenance work, while the protective enclosures of&nbsp;four of them conform to IP67 standards for protection from dust and moisture. The use of multi-pin connectors to replace wiring inside manifold blocks provides flexibility when adding stations or changing manifold configuration. The VQC series has outstanding response times and long life. </P>

branchItem.bullets: For VQC5000 base mount, plug-in valves<div>Protective enclosure conforms to IP67 for protection from dust and moisture</div><div>Gateway type serial transmission system </div><div>Replaceable one-touch fittings</div><div>1 to 12 stations available as standard</div>
